post.title: Tony Goodhew is Blogging
post.content: Good pal Tony Goodhew just started blogging this past Sunday. He’s already posted 15 times. Even though he’s a Product Manager in the developer division and has been involved in J#, he hasn’t posted much on technology yet but he sure has several opinions on the NFL.
